identified-content.org: INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE (IRS) INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE
identified-content.object.title: SPORTS PEOPLE (TIMES COLUMN)

block.p: The Internal Revenue Service is apparently investigating RICKEY HENDERSON, baseball's stolen base leader.

ESPN and The Associated Press reported on Tuesday that Henderson, 37, is under investigation by the Federal tax agency for possible unreported income from autograph and memorabilia shows. Neither Henderson, who recently signed as a free agent with the San Diego Padres, nor his agent could be reached for comment yesterday.
